{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Sport stacking {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Sport stacking Sport stacking , also known as cup stacking or speed stacking , is an individual and team sport that involves stacking 9 or 12 (usually 12) specially designed cups in pre-determined sequences as fast as possible. The cups are specially designed to allow for speedier times. Participants of sport stacking stack cups in specific sequences, by aligning the inside left lateral adjunct of each cup with that of the next. Sequences are usually pyramids of 3, 6, or 10 cups. Players compete against the clock or another player. The governing body setting the rule is the World Sport Stacking Association (WSSA). Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sport stacking)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
